Module tagtraum.jitlibrary
Package com.tagtraum.jitlibrary

Class ITLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tagtraum.jitlibrary.ReferenceCountedObject
      • com.tagtraum.jitlibrary.ITLibrary

  • public class ITLibrary
extends ReferenceCountedObject
    Central access point to this API. To get started, call getInstance(boolean) and then start accessing playlists or media items (aka tracks).

    Important
    You must code sign your app to retrieve information with this framework, and iTunes library access is read-only. This framework is available to users with iTunes 11 or later.

    Author:
    Hendrik Schreiber
    See Also:
    Apple ITLibrary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ITLibrary getInstance​(boolean load)
                             throws Exception
        Initialize the ITLibrary. If load is true, this method blocks. If load is false, this method returns right away, but may return null.
        Parameters:
        load - make sure the library is indeed loaded.
        Returns:
        either the library object or null, if not yet available
        Throws:
        Exception - if something goes wrong.

        Throws:

      • getLastItemModification

        public Date getLastItemModification​()
        Greatest last played, addition or modification date for any items in the library. May be null, if we cannot determine the date.
        Returns:
        date or null

      • getPlaylistHash

        public int getPlaylistHash​()
        Hash value that represents the current playlists. If consecutive values differ, it's very likely at least one playlist has changed.
        Returns:
        hash value
